::: {.callout-note}
## Take-aways from the most recent class

[On Math 300 Blog](https://dtkaplan.github.io/Math300blog)

:::

```{r include=FALSE}
library(math300)
lesson_links <- function(daynum) {
  glue::glue("[Reading](Textbook/Reading-notes-lesson-{daynum}.html) :  [Student notes](Student-notes/Student-notes-lesson-{daynum}.html)")
}
reading_link <- function(daynum) {
  glue::glue("[Reading](https://dtkaplan.github.io/Lessons-in-statistical-thinking/Lesson-{daynum}.html)")
}
instructor_notes <- function(daynum) {
  glue::glue("[Lesson {daynum}:](Day-by-day/Lesson-{daynum}/Teaching-notes-{daynum}.html)")
}
solved_worksheet <- function(daynum) {
  glue::glue("[Solns](Worksheets/Worksheet-{daynum}.html)")
}
takeaway <- function(daynum) {
  glue::glue("[take-aways](https://dtkaplan.github.io/Math300blog/posts/Takeaways-{daynum}/)")
}

syllabus_row <- function(date, daynum, subject, activity="link", video="NA", header=FALSE) {
  solved_worksheet <- function(daynum) {
    glue::glue("[Soln](Worksheets/Worksheet-{daynum}.html)")
  }
  takeaway <- function(daynum) {
    glue::glue("[Blog-{daynum}](https://dtkaplan.github.io/Math300blog/posts/Takeaways-{daynum}/)")
  }
  instructor_notes <- function(daynum) {
    glue::glue("[Notes](Day-by-day/Lesson-{daynum}/Teaching-notes-{daynum}.html)")
  }
  reading_link <- function(daynum) {
    glue::glue("[Reading](https://dtkaplan.github.io/Lessons-in-statistical-thinking/Lesson-{daynum}.html)")
  }
  
  if (is.na(video)) {
    video_text <- "NA"
  } else {
    video_text <- glue::glue("[video]({video})")
  }
  
  if (header) {
    "Date | Class day | Topic | Activity | Soln | Take away |  Classroom video\n:------|:---------|----|----|----|--------|---"
  } else {
    glue::glue("{date} | Lesson {daynum} {instructor_notes(daynum)}:{reading_link(daynum)} | {subject} | {activity} | {solved_worksheet(daynum)} | {takeaway(daynum)} | {video_text}")
  }
}
```

Math 300Z is the prototype for scheduled revisions to Math 300. The revisions apply only to Lessons 19 and up; the first 18 lessons come from Math 300.
